name: Cute Rabbit Pencil Case - a great gift idea!
description:
These are so cute and different to any other pencil case you have seen.

Made from a soft suede like fabric the rabbit ears fold over and close with 2 checked fabric poppers.

Lift up the ears to reveal a cheeky rabbit face plus a home for your pens and pencils.

A great gift idea.

(Pencils and paperclips not included)

name: Little Red Riding Hood Lunch Bag / Handbag
description:
This cute little bag is idea for carrying your lunch our other bits and bobs.

Choose from four adorable Little Red Riding Hood designs. Each features a very distinctive doodle style drawing design. 

Made of high quality canvas that is waterproof inside.

Zip closure to the top to make sure your belongings are safe.

Size: 19.5 x 22 x 11.5cm (approx)

name: 2013 tinyWishes Keepsake Decoration - add one to your order!
description:
The limited Edition tinyWishes Keepsake Tree Trinket 

Made from genuine wood and presented in a cute envelope with sentiment sticker, these make great little gifts for friends. You could even pop them into your Christmas cards.

What is a Tree Trinket?

“Hang this special wooden trinket on your Christmas tree or door handle as a reminder that it’s the small things that make 
Christmas so special”

“When the festivities are over and the decorations packed away keep this trinket to hand as a reminder of the magical
memories you have created”

name: Leather & Crystal Double Wrap Bracelets - choose from 3 colours
description:
These bracelets are made from genuine leather and wrap around your wrist twice.

They feature a toggle closure and will fit most wrist sizes.

They have an amazing shine and sparkle to them and make an wonderful Christmas gift.

Gift packaged in a beautiful luxury velvet pouch.

name: Luxury Angel Wing Wish Bracelet made with Swarovski Crystal
description:
These stunningly beautiful bracelets are sure to be the envy of all your friends.

Each bracelet consists of 30mm genuine Swarovski crystal angel wing on 30cm of red waxed linen. If you would prefer pink, purple, brown, blue or black linen just let us know when you pay.
Make a wish as you tie on your bracelet. 

Legend has it when your bracelet naturally breaks your wish may just come true.

The bracelet can be trimmed to the perfect size and comes with an extra set of cord to replace the bracelet when it eventually breaks.

Each bracelet comes complete with a tinyWishes sentiment card and luxury gift pouch. An extra piece on linen is provided so you can replace it once it has snapped.

Very limited stock.

name: White Rabbit & Super Ninja Rabbit Lunch / Storage Bags
description:
These cool bags can be used for just about everything (lunch box, travel bag, snacks, light clothes, and makeup!)

The drawstring closure makes it so easy to store your things and keep them safe

Size: 34cm x 21.5cm 

Ultra light weight and made from 100% cotton

A great and unusual stocking filler idea from tinyWishes

Each comes of 30cm of waxed linen thread and can be trimmed to the perfect size.

-Royal Corgi
-Tower Bridge
-London Bus
-Royal Guard 

Beautifully gift packaged in a luxury velvet pouch and complete with a mini tinyWishes postcard that explains the legend of the Wish Bracelet.

Very limited edition as we have only made 2 of each design. Be quick if you love these as much as we do!

name: Enamel Evil Eye Red String Wish Bracelet
description:
This wish bracelet is made from a single strand of genuine red Irish linen and features an enamel evil eye charm.

The legend of the evil eye...

The evil eye is thought to protect the wearer against misfortune and from bad things happening in one’s life.

The evil eye is a shield against various forms of bad luck that is willed onto you by others. It’s thought to help keep your life in balance, protecting you from bad karma.

This bracelet is 30cm in length and is designed to be worn indefinitely.

Tie the bracelet on as a reminder to think and be positive;
remembering what goes around comes around.

Complete with a gift card explaining the legend.

A great gift for a guy or a girl and an ideal friendship bracelet.

name: Silk Wish Bracelet with golden Swarovski Crystal
description:
This deluxe tinyWishes bracelet features a genuine large Swarovski. 

The golden coloured faceted crystal sparkles like you will not believe.

The pure silk pink bracelet measures 50cm in length and can be tied around your wrist twice.

The crystal heart is free to move along the silk cord, by tying loose knots before and after the crystal you can position it anywhere you desire, creating a number of different looks.

Presented in a luxurious velvet pouch and tinyWishes sentiment card.

description:
What goes around comes around, remember to keep the circle positive with this special tinyWishes bracelet.

Made from a single strand of red waxed Irish linen and featuring a genuine hematite karma circle, this bracelet is a great gift.

Hematite grounds and protects us. It strengthens our connection with the earth, making us feel safe and secure. It endows us with courage, strength, endurance and vitality. 

A 'stone for the mind', Hematite stimulates concentration and focus, enhancing memory and original thought.
This bracelet is 30cm in length and is designed to be worn indefinitely.

Complete with a tinyWishes* make a wish sentiment card.

Love, wisdom and friendship from Babushka

description:

Each bracelet features a row butterflies - a symbol to bring the wearer lots of good luck.

These lace style bracelets are the latest craze across Italy. Get yours first from tinyWishes!

Each bracelet comes presented in a cute packet with a Bello Bracelet sticker.

Choose from 12 colours - even better buy more than one and stack them up for that ultimate boho look.

name: Luxury Leather Wrap Bracelet made with Swarovski Crystal
description:
These stunningly beautiful bracelets are sure to be the envy of all your friends. 

Each bracelet consists of 50cm of buttery soft leather and a 17mm genuine Swarovski crystal heart. Simply wrap around your wrist and tie for that effortless chic look as the heart will catch the light with every movement of your wrist. 

Choose from the fiery red tones of the Red Magma heart with dark brown leather or the glistening champagne tones of the Golden Shadow heart with biscuit coloured leather.

Each bracelet comes complete with a tinyWishes sentiment card and luxury gift pouch.

Very limited stock.

name: Russian Doll Letter Writing Stationery Set
description:
There is nothing more magical than writing a letter to a loved one. Make your letter even more special with our Russian Doll writing set. This wonderful set comes complete with 

- 8 pieces of lined paper - each sheet having a different Russian Doll design

- 4 Russian Doll tags 

- 4 Envelopes

- Red string for that finishing touch 

Size:130X180mm

Imported from Korea, a country famous for its cute designs this would make a great gift for a stationery fan!

description:

This cool new addition to our collection looks great stacked up with our other bracelets.

Simply tie the ribbon on and believe in the magic of your Guardian Angel.

29cm in length (approx).

A great gift for a guy or girl.

WE ARE ON THE ONLY UK STOCKIST OF THIS NEW BRACELET

name: Luxurious Lucky Bracelet – choose from 4 designs
description:
WAS £10 each 

Choose from 4 Evil Eye charms or an eye catching Hamsa Hand. Each bracelet features a highly detailed charm as well as hematite beads.

The evil eye is thought to protect the wearer against misfortune and from bad things happening in one’s life.

The evil eye is a shield against various forms of bad luck that is willed onto you by others. It’s thought to help keep your life in balance, protecting you from bad karma.

The Hamsa Hand is an ancient Middle Eastern amulet symbolizing the Hand of God. In all faiths it is a protective sign. It brings the wearer happiness, luck, health, and good fortune.

Complete with a luxurious velvet gift back and tinyWishes branded ribbon these new bracelets are a great gift choice.

Each bracelet is adjustable to fit most sizes.

name: Join the new exclusive tinyWishes Club* from £15 Get a SURPRISE delivery every month!
description:
Be part of our club, be part of the magic!
 
During your special 3 month membership you will auto'magically' receive special edition wish bracelets each month as well as other surprises through the post. 

Everyone loves getting a surprise through the post!

A great gift for yourself or a fabulous gift for a friend.

If you purchase a gift membership we will contact you to get the recipients details.

There are 3 options to join the tinyWishes Club*


Platinum membership £40 (3 months)

Platinum membership is for ultimate tinyWishes fan! You receive a welcome gift, 4 surprise bracelets each month.

Platinum membership only has a limited number of spaces.

Gold Membership £30 (3 months)

You will receive 3 surprise bracelets each month for 3 months, making a total of 9 bracelets.

Silver Membership £15 (3 months)

You will receive 1 surprise bracelets each month for 3 months, making a total of 3 bracelets. This is a great way to try the Club!

There is no obligation to renew your membership after 3 months.

Each bracelet features a stunningly simple sterling silver tube charm.

name: Italian Glass Wish Bracelet- Great for stacking with other bracelets
description:
These simply stunning wish bracelets feature a Millefiori heart shapped bead.

Millefiori is a glasswork technique which produces distinctive decorative patterns on glassware. The term millefiori is a combination of the Italian words "mille" (thousand) and "fiori" (flowers).

We have many different design Millefiori beads so your bracelet design will be selected at random, we think this adds to the magic!

These bracelets look great stacked together so we are offering discounts with the more you buy.

Each bracelet is 30cm in length and can be trimmed to the perfect size.

A sentiment card is supplied with each bracelet making this an ideal gift.

The legend of the evil eye...

The evil eye is thought to protect the wearer against misfortune and from bad things happening in one’s life.  

The evil eye is a shield against various forms of bad luck that is willed onto you by others. It’s thought to help keep your life in balance, protecting you from bad karma.

This bracelet is 30cm in length and is designed to be worn indefinitely.

remembering what goes around comes around.

name: Chinese Lucky Money Frog Wish Bracelet
description:
"Give the gift of good fortune"

Made from red genuine Irish linen this bracelet features a Chinese Money Frog charm. The highly detailed charm measures around 2cm in height.

The bracelet is 30cm in length and can be trimmed to fit all wrist sizes. 

The legend... 
The Money Frog, also known as Chan Chu is an ancient and popular Chinese symbol for prosperity. They are said to be the bearer of good fortune, which is why you always see them holding a lucky Ching Dynasty coin in their mouth.

This is your chance to make a wish and wear a wish. Tie the bracelet around your wrist and make a wish, legend has it that when the bracelet naturally wears off and breaks your wish should come.

Complete with sentiment card explaining the legend.

Handmade in England.

Available in packs of 2. A great gift for a guy or a girl and an ideal friendship bracelet.

name: Sterling Silver Tiny, Tiny Wish Bracelet
description:
Made from a single strand of waxed Irish linen this bracelet features a 5mm tiny sterling silver heart. It’s so tiny we named it twice ‘The Tiny, Tiny Wish Bracelet’. It maybe a small heart but it can have a lot of meaning for you or a friend.

The bracelet is 30cm in length and can be trimmed to fit all wrist sizes. 

The bracelet is beautifully gift packaged in a glossy folded presentation card with a hand tied ribbon. 

This is your chance to make a wish and wear a wish. Tie the bracelet around your wrist and make a wish, legend has it that when the bracelet naturally wears off and breaks your wish should come true.

name: Red String Hamsa Hand Bracelet
description:
For generations a red string bracelet has been believed to ward off evil and promote positivity.

Made famous by many Hollywood celebrities the red string bracelet has also become one of the hottest fashion accessories.

This unique bracelet is a modern twist to the classic woollen red string bracelet worn by thousands.

Made from handcrafted waxed Irish linen and features a silver plated Hamsa hand charm.

This bracelet is 30cm in length and is designed to be worn indefinitely. Tie the bracelet on while having positive thoughts in order to attract peace and protect against evil.

Each bracelet comes on a high quality ‘meaning card’ making this an ideal gift for a loved one.

name: Crystal Star 'Once Upon a Wish' Bracelet
description:
Every time you see your crystal glisten remember to believe in the magic of your dreams as they hold the power to make your wishes come true.  

Let the magic begin by tying on your bracelet and making a special wish. 

The tale says that when your bracelet breaks your wish may just come true. 

Handmade in England using a genuine Swarovski™ crystal charm and pink Irish linen. 

Measuring 30cm in length the bracelet can be trimmed to your perfect size. 

Each bracelet is presented on a Once Upon a Wish card complete with gifting envelope and hand tied ribbon.

name: Gold Vermeil & Silk Om Charm Bracelet- Very Limited Edition
description:
Limted Edition

Om is the symbol of harmony within ourselves and oneness with the universe.

The stunning Gold Vermeil Om charm sits on a beautiful hand painted burgundy silk ribbon. The length is around 88cm which been it be wrapped around your wrist a number of times. The weight of the charm means you can also use the ribbon as a necklace.

If you’re not sure what gold vermeil is, it’s sterling silver coated with 14 carat gold.

The bracelet comes with a  luxury velvet pouch.

Handmade in England

name: Silly Socks by Joy & Jumble
description:
What’s more fun than wearing mismatch socks?

Joy & Jumble have created this fun and quirky gift wrapped and ready to give.

Each pair of Joy & Jumble socks comes complete with a ‘sock peg’ and are presented in a sealed in brown envelope.
What designs you will receive will be  a mystery until the envelope is ripped open! Two things are for sure, they’ll be odd and they’ll  make you smile.
 
Designed to be worn big and baggy on the girls or standard fitting on the guys the socks come in one size:

Sizes:
UK  6-11
EUR 40-45

A cool & quirky gift created in England by Joy & Jumble.

PLEASE NOTE: we have changed the design of the peg. This is now a cute bulldog style clip that can be reused.

name: Silk Wish & Friendship Bracelet with Swarovski Butterfly
description:
LIMITED EDITION

This deluxe Tiny Wishes bracelet features a genuine Swarovski butterflyheart measuring 1cm. The faceted crystal sparkles like you will not believe. 

The pure silk bracelet measures 40cm in length and can be tied around your wrist twice. 

The crystal butterfly is free to move along the silk cord, by tying loose knots before and after the crystal you can position it anywhere you desire, creating a number of different looks.  

This Tiny Wishes bracelet is presented on a wishcard, in a presentation envelope with a ribbon.

Available in red, purple, pink and black silk bracelet.
